LanguageData.SydailyVine_Tiny_SydailyFox.label: SydailyVine
LanguageData.SydailyVine_Tiny_SydailyFox.description:
It's a weird plant that grew out of the Fox's ear. 

The vine escaped from the Fox was rotting fast. 

（Its taste is unacceptable to most races.）
LanguageData.SydailyVine_Tiny_SydailyFox.comps.3.useL: \n<color=#fbef97>Since it grew out of the Fox's ear...</color>
